content: view the pattern online now https //en susudiy com/detail id=1910238741717323778 the crocheting guidance available as following https //youtu be/7iw5jtfj_jy **get yarn kit now** shop on susan s family 5% off ship to us&eu https //susudiy myshopify com/products/heartfelt-bouquet-shawl-crochet-yarn-kit **same yarn here** *4ply cotton* susan s family 5% off ship to us&eu https //susudiy myshopify com/products/combed-cotton-4-ply-60-cotton-40-acrylic-yarn-susans-family amazon ship to us eu au ca jp uk https //www amazon com/dp/b0dk728z9v maas=maas_adg_889c290d43de9bda447aa1cbdcc98098_afap_abs&ref_=aa_maas&tag=maas *dawn impression* susan s family 5% off ship to us&eu https //susudiy myshopify com/products/dawn-impression amazon ship to us eu au ca jp uk https //www amazon com/stores/page/d019c208-7ae2-4d95-a3d7-1c35edc3a457 maas=maas_adg_99afff2fc799d07e6d346c484892da68_afap_abs&ref_=aa_maas&tag=maas *impression misty feather* susan s family 5% off ship to us&eu https //susudiy myshopify com/products/impression-misty-feather amazon ship to us eu au ca jp uk https //www amazon com/stores/page/d019c208-7ae2-4d95-a3d7-1c35edc3a457 maas=maas_adg_99afff2fc799d07e6d346c484892da68_afap_abs&ref_=aa_maas&tag=maas yarn amount the crocheting guidance will guide you step by step through completing this project and we hope that during the process you discover even more joy in the colors and stitching techniques used please visit our youtube channel - susan s family to view them you can also find us at https //www instagram com/susansfamily2013/ more product can be found in this account please remember to subscribe & turn on notifications if you d like to know immediately when there s a new video up
